segments.text: Excuse me.sir . Can I have look at the timetable please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is flight ZW203 a direct one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it stopped at Honolulu.Would you like to book one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Is there any direct flight to New York ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . I am sorry . ZW203 is the only one to New York .
segments.speaker: S2
